title: Xabi Alonso - Wikipedia
snippet: On 25 May 2025, Alonso's former club Real Madrid announced his appointment as head coach for the next three seasons, starting from 1 June 2025.

title: Who will be the next Real Madrid manager if Xabi Alonso is sacked?
snippet: In May 2025, he was appointed head coach of Real Madrid Castilla following Raul’s resignation. Arbeloa was already a candidate when Alonso was hired.

title: OFFICIAL: Real Madrid announce Xabi Alonso as new head coach | beIN SPORTS
snippet: Xabi Alonso has been officially named Real Madrid’s new head coach starting June 2025. After a historic season with Bayer Leverkusen, he returns to the Spanish giants with a deal through 2028.

title: Alonso confirmed as new Real Madrid coach
snippet: We cannot provide a description for this page right now

title: Xabi Alonso named new Real Madrid coach
snippet: Xabi Alonso (Tolosa, 25/11/1981) is Real Madrid's new coach. The 43-year-old Spanish manager returns to the club where he clinched six trophies as a player to become a madridista legend.
